name: Angular-ngi18n
body:
# angular-ngi18n Provides internationalization to angularJS projects. Requires $resource bower install angular-ngi18n ## Get Started ... angular.module('yourApp', ['ngI18n']) ... .controller('MainCtrl', function ($scope, $i18n) { ## Configuration (angular-ngi18n.js) var config = { files : 'i18n/:lang.json', //Ex : 'i18n/en.json' languages : ['en', 'fr'] //config.languages[0] == default }; ## Sample I am 26 years old {{'how.old.are.you' | i18n:[26]}} ## Sample This is the translation of 'key.in.i18n.file' key { {'key.in.i18n.file' | i18n} } { ... "key.in.i18n.file" : "This is the translation of 'key.in.i18n.file' key", ... } ## Sample
... $scope.currentLang = $i18n.getLanguage(); $scope.changeLanguage = function(){ $i18n.changeLanguage(this.currentLang); };
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
